title: Even If She’s the Demon King’s Daughter, She’ll Betray Him Because the Hero’s Party is Yuri Heaven! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Yuri
tags: Battle Academy   Demon Lord   Demons   Enemies Become Lovers   Heroes   Love at First Sight
author: Sanshoku Light   三色ライト
description:
The Demon King continues to attack and invade the human world. His daughter, Lily Fauldefort, is ordered to attend the Hero Academy to sabotage the Hero Candidates. However, as she spends precious days with her fellow students, she came to a certain conclusion. That is:

“The Hero’s Party is so precious… I will defect from the Demon King’s army!”>
